name: Paola Flocchini
content: Paola Flocchini Paola Flocchini PhD'95 (Milan) Professor University Research Chair Research Interests Distributed Computing, Distributed Algorithms, Time-Varying Graphs, Distributed Mobile Entities, Algorithms by Autonomous Robots, Sense of Direction, Cellular Automata.
